title: User Authentication and Multi-Factor Security
summary: Implement secure login and multi-factor authentication for all users.
description: Develop a secure login mechanism incorporating username, password, and an additional verification method such as OTP, biometric, or push notification. Ensure compliance with current security standards and data privacy regulations. Include session management, timeout handling, and encryption of sensitive credentials both in transit and at rest.

title: Responsive User Interface and Dashboard
summary: Design a responsive and personalized dashboard accessible across devices.
description: Create a user-friendly, adaptive portal interface that automatically adjusts for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. The dashboard should display user-specific information including account summaries, available products, and personalized insights. Provide easy navigation and quick access to key banking services while maintaining brand consistency.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate portal with the existing core banking system.
description: Implement secure APIs and integration components to synchronize customer data, account status, and transaction metadata between the self-service portal and the bankâ€™s core system. Ensure data consistency, performance optimization, and proper error handling for synchronization failures or latency issues.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Build workflows for new account requests and service changes.
description: Develop guided workflows allowing customers to open new accounts or request modifications to existing services. Workflows should minimize input requirements, validate data inline, and allow users to save progress for later completion. Ensure these workflows trigger backend integrations and status tracking mechanisms.

title: Real-Time Status Updates and Notifications
summary: Provide real-time updates and automated email notifications.
description: Implement a notification system to keep users informed about request progress in real time. Integrate email and push notifications to alert customers to status changes or actions required. Ensure reliability and consistency of updates by integrating with workflow and backend API layers.

title: Document Upload and Application Management
summary: Enable document upload and management of incomplete applications.
description: Create functionality for users to upload required documents safely with encryption and malware scanning. Allow users to save incomplete applications and resume them later without losing progress. Manage document storage and retrieval securely while maintaining compliance with data retention policies.

title: User Interaction History and Data Management
summary: Maintain comprehensive interaction and transaction history.
description: Build a tracking module that records all user interactions, requests, and transactions performed through the portal. Provide a user-facing history view for transparency and a back-office data repository for analytics and compliance reporting. Implement role-based access to ensure only authorized data visibility.

title: Role-Based Access Control and Authorization
summary: Implement access control based on user roles and profiles.
description: Develop a robust role-based access control system to ensure each user only sees products and services applicable to their authorization level. Define role hierarchies, permission sets, and dynamic menu rendering based on user type, ensuring adherence to least privilege and regulatory compliance.

title: Secure Data Storage and Compliance Assurance
summary: Ensure secure storage and compliance with data protection regulations.
description: Establish encrypted data storage with secure backups, access logs, and audit trails. Ensure compliance with financial data protection laws and internal governance policies. Implement continuous monitoring, anomaly detection, and regular security assessments to maintain an optimal security posture.
